search.query: index=cve sourcetype=cveinfo cve=cve-$year$* | stats count by cve
index=cve sourcetype=cveinfo cve=$cve$ | stats latest(publishedDate) as "Date Published", latest(lastModifiedDate) as "Date Last Modified", latest(description.description_data{}.value) as Description

index=cve sourcetype=cveinfo cve=$cve$ | stats latest(impact.baseMetricV2.exploitabilityScore) as v2_exp_score, latest(impact.baseMetricV2.impactScore) as v2_imp_score,latest(impact.baseMetricV2.severity) as v2_severity, latest(impact.baseMetricV3.exploitabilityScore) as v3_exp_score, latest(impact.baseMetricV3.impactScore) as v3_imp_score

index=cve sourcetype=cveproducts cve=$cve$ | spath affects.vendor.vendor_data{}.product.product_data{} output=x | mvexpand x | spath input=x| stats count by affects.vendor.vendor_data{}.vendor_name ,product_name, version.version_data{}.version_affected, version.version_data{}.version_value | rename affects.vendor.vendor_data{}.vendor_name as vendor_name, version.version_data{}.version_affected as version_affected, version.version_data{}.version_value as version_value| fields - count

index=cve sourcetype=cvereferences cve=$cve$ | spath references.reference_data{}.name output=x | mvexpand x | spath input=x| stats count by references.reference_data{}.url | rename references.reference_data{}.url as URL | table URL
